title: CashSettlementMethodEnum
description: Defines the different cash settlement methods for a product where cash settlement is applicable.

oneOf.title: CashPriceAlternateMethod
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (b).

oneOf.title: CashPriceMethod
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (a).

oneOf.title: CollateralizedCashPriceMethod
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method (yield curve) used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (g) (published in Supplement number 28). The method is defined in the 2021 ISDA Definitions, section 18.2.6.

oneOf.title: CrossCurrencyMethod
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (f) (published in Supplement number 23).

oneOf.title: MidMarketCalculationAgentDetermination
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2021 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.2.3.

oneOf.title: MidMarketIndicativeQuotations
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2021 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.2.1.

oneOf.title: MidMarketIndicativeQuotationsAlternate
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2021 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.2.2.

oneOf.title: ParYieldCurveAdjustedMethod
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (c).

oneOf.title: ParYieldCurveUnadjustedMethod
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2006 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.3. Cash Settlement Methods, paragraph (e).

oneOf.title: ReplacementValueCalculationAgentDetermination
oneOf.description: An ISDA defined cash settlement method used for the determination of the applicable cash settlement amount. The method is defined in the 2021 ISDA Definitions, Section 18.2.5

oneOf.title: ReplacementValueFirmQuotations

oneOf.title: ZeroCouponYieldAdjustedMethod
